text: bharyamar, putranmar, kumparamayikkuttiya svarnam, velli, mettaram kutirakal, nalkali vargannal, krsiyitam enninnane istapetta vastukkaleatulla premam manusyarkk alankaramayi teannikkappettirikkunnu. ateakke ihaleakajivitattile vibhavannalakunnu. allahuvinre atukkalakunnu (manusyarkkâ€Œ) cennuceranulla uttama sanketam
